data.text: @arunabk19 @UdhavThackeray @CMOMaharashtra @AmhiDombivlikar It may be another scam by corrupt officials. Please follow up. And keep tracking and be in touch with other beneficiaries about their status
@arunabk19 @AmhiDombivlikar @UdhavThackeray @CMOMaharashtra Mam, take help of one good  lawyer and file a case in HC.

@AmhiDombivlikar @arunabk19 @UdhavThackeray @CMOMaharashtra File one case against the Maharashtra government ASAP. They are supposed to pay within 10 days.

https://t.co/jme98aXz3k

@arunabk19 @UdhavThackeray @CMOMaharashtra @AmhiDombivlikar @DrSEShinde @mieknathshinde @DombivlikarRavi @rajupatilmanase 
Can you please look into this on priority and help our sister to solve the issue soon.
@arunabk19 @UdhavThackeray @CMOMaharashtra @AmhiDombivlikar Sorry for your loss,hope govt jaldi process complete karde.@AUThackeray
@arunabk19 @UdhavThackeray @CMOMaharashtra Sorry for your loss. Please be patience.  Many are having similar experience.
